Kitchen.description: A dark and dirty room buzzing with flies.

Ballroom.description: A large room with shiny wooden floors; it looks like a nice place to dance.

Dining Hall.description: A vast room with a long table where a feast could be held.

Library.description: A quiet place filled with books

Bedroom.description: A chilly bedroom that looks like a crime scene.

Garden.description: A lush garden full of flowers

Study.description: You've entered a dimly lit Study Room, the scent of old books and parchment filling the air. Who knows what you could find in here?...
